definitions.definition: The ventral portion of the midbrain , divided from the tectum by the cerebral aqueduct and the periaqueductal grey .
Containing the following nuclei: red nucleus , substantia nigra , ventral tegmental area .

main_definition: ( neuroanatomy ) The ventral portion of the midbrain , divided from the tectum by the cerebral aqueduct and the periaqueductal grey .
secondary_definitions: ( neuroanatomy ) Containing the following nuclei: red nucleus , substantia nigra , ventral tegmental area .
